summary: A son's riveting look at a father whose life seemed straight out of a spy thriller. The secret world of a legendary CIA spymaster. Told by William Colby's son Carl, the story is at once a ... See full summary Â»

title: The Man Nobody Knew: In Search of My Father, CIA Spymaster William Colby
